summary:
### GitHub Notifications Summary

#### PrefectHQ/prefect
- **Issue**: [Display Field descriptions in deployment run UI when used as flow parameter type](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/13912)
- **Pull Requests**:
  - [Unpin pydantic and fix tests](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15321) (Author)
  - [Add some UI scaffolding for flows](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15612) (Review Requested)
  - [Fix issue where transaction parent look up fails in rollback hooks](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15599) (Review Requested)
  - [Publish openAPI yaml in ci/cd](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15549) (Review Requested)
  - [Update the store flow code docs](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15604) (Review Requested)
  - [Flow code storage docs improvements](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15519) (Review Requested)
- **Issues**:
  - [Flow object doesn't work with Python's inspect.getfile](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/10979)
  - [Task Runs Concurrency slots not released when flow runs in Kubernetes are cancelled](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/8566)
  - [/flows/paginate returns optional flow_ids](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15609)
  - [Error while executing 'Access data within transactions' example code](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15593)
  - [All store flow code examples should be consolidated into the same page](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/14387)
  - [Prefect3.0 not running subflows in parallel](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15415)
- **Releases**:
  - [3.0.5.dev4: Nightly Development Release](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/releases/178840064)
- **CI Activity**: Multiple workflow runs failed or were canceled across various branches, including main and settings-docs-update.

#### PrefectHQ/ControlFlow
- **Pull Requests**:
  - [Make flow context explicit](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/ControlFlow/pulls/354)
  - [Introduce ways to control agentic loop termination](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/ControlFlow/pulls/348)
- **Issues**:
  - [Confusion and Conflation between Prefect Flow / Task and Controlflow Flow / Task](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/ControlFlow/issues/353)

#### PrefectHQ/flows
- **Pull Requests**:
  - [Run 2.X workers in 1/3 of load-testing clusters](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/flows/pulls/2061) (Review Requested)
  - [Dependency-version-minor-bump-2024-10-07](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/flows/pulls/2058) (Review Requested)

#### PrefectHQ/platform
- **Pull Requests**:
  - [nebula-2024.1008.161852](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/platform/pulls/7602) (Review Requested)
  - [Chore/Add secret for flux webhook url for alerts-cloud2 channels](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/platform/pulls/7599) (Review Requested)
  - [nebula-2024.1007.200559](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/platform/pulls/7600) (Review Requested)

#### PrefectHQ/nebula
- **Releases**:
  - [2024.1008.161852](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/nebula/releases/178942539)
  - [Bump Auth HPA min/max to 40/50](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/nebula/pulls/8592) (Review Requested)
